translate.name: account_admin
translate.password_change_match: The new password you provided was not entered the same in the confirm field, please try again.
translate.password_changed: Your password has been changed to the new password you submitted.
translate.password_reset: If you have forgotten your password, we can issue you a temporary access code via email that will allow you to change your password. To start this process, please enter either your e-mail address or username to begin. Please do not enter both, simply providing one or the other will do just fine.
translate.password_reset_req: You must provide either your e-mail address or username in order to retrieve your password
translate.password_reset_spam_limit: You have already submitted the password reset request for this account within the past %limit% seconds, please wait to try again
translate.password_reset_no_match: Sorry, we cannot find any matching accounts for the criteria you submitted, please double check your information and try again
translate.password_reset_sent: Thank you, we have sent an email to your email address on file with a link for changing your password. The link is valid for 15 minutes only, so be sure to check your email right away.
translate.password_reset_bad_url: The link you followed has either expired, or been malformed by your email reader. If you suspect that it did not copy correctly from your email reader, please paste the entire link from your email reader to the address bar in your browser. Otherwise, you can restart your password reset request by clicking the link below:
translate.password_update_success: Your password has been updated successfully!
translate.password_reset_instructions: Please enter the new password for your account below.
translate.password_reset_reqq: You must enter a new password
translate.user_add_active_welcome: Thank you for registering, your account has been successfully registered and you have been logged in.
translate.user_add_inactive_welcome:
Thank you for taking the first step of the registration process. To finish the registration process, please check your e-mail. We have sent you a link - once you visit the link in the e-mail, your account status will be updated to active and there will be nothing left for you to do.

If you do not receive the verification email shortly, you can click the "Verify Account" link to request that we resend the verification email.
translate.verify_resend_instructions: If you are having trouble with the verification code, or never received the verification email, you can use this form to request that we resend the verification email to you. Please enter either your username or email address, not both.
translate.validate_success: Thank you, your account is now validated and you can login!
translate.validate_fail: Oops, there was a problem with the url you followed, please enter the verification code from your email in the box below
translate.verification_code_instructions: Please enter the verification code from the email you recieved below. If you have not recieved the verification email, or are having trouble, you can use the form below to request that the verification email be resent.
translate.verify_resend_req: You must enter either your username or e-mail address in order for the verification e-mail to be resent.
translate.verify_resend_active: Your account is already active... you can login now.
